creator: sgabriel@brainfuse.com
text:
the http get task creates an empty file even if the request fails, from the 
code the Get task creates a FileoutputStream to the output file before it gets 
the status of the connection so if the status is 500 the FileOutputStream 
writes a file entry already to the filesystem. If you are using available task 
to check for the file existence it will returns true, even if the file is empty.
